name: Dark Awakening
description: dim red underlay with violet spotlights pulsing slowly, setting ominous tone

name: Drum Drop Impact
description: sudden white strobe flash from all fixtures as heavy drums kick in, synchronized to bass line

name: Energy Surge
description: rapid blue and purple sweeps across stage with high-intensity movements, matching the syncopated energy boost

name: Pattern Shift
description: synchronized red and white strobe pulses transitioning between fixtures, highlighting the drum pattern change

name: Tom HiHat Phase
description: coordinated green and yellow movements from Proton L/R paired with subtle amber highlights on ParCan R/L, capturing the toms and hihats pattern

name: Bridge Build-Up
description: rapid purple strobe pulses intensifying across all fixtures while dimmer red undertone deepens, emphasizing the alternate kick-snares rhythm

name: Exit Tension
description: steady amber light from Proton L/R with white highlights on ParCan R/L as snare patterns continue building intensity

name: Outro Fade
description: gradual transition to deep violet undertones with subtle pulsing purple accents, mirroring the song's final fade
